messages.speaker: customer
messages.text: What happens if I need to make changes?

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: We have several options available for you.

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: You're covered for the following scenarios...

messages.speaker: customer
messages.text: How long does claim settlement usually take?

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: The typical timeframe is about 5-7 working days.

messages.speaker: customer
messages.text: Can you explain what's covered in my policy?

notes: Customer called regarding interested in upgrading coverage. Customer satisfied with outcome.
